preqs: One of EAE2011 or MTH1030, MTH1035 OR ENG1005

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {EAE2011, ENG1005, MTH1030, MTH1035}

unitName: Introduction to atmospheric physics and dynamics
description: This unit examines atmospheric thermodynamics and dynamics,including cloud processes, the dynamics and prediction of severestorms (including tornadoes and tropical cyclones), the structure andevolution of extra-tropical cyclones and their associated fronts, and thetechniques used in forecasting the day-to-day weather.
